---
title: \sffamily{``Title''}
#subtitle: uncomment for use of subtitle
author: 
  - author one
  - author two 
affiliation: 
  - affiliation one 
  - affiliation two
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
#date: "`r format(Sys.Date(), '%A, %B %d, %Y')`" #I like old school dates :-)
output:
  rmdplugr::pdf_article:
    includes:
      in_header: 
        - texheader.tex
        - font-selection
    author_block: TRUE
    keep_tex: TRUE
    toc: no
    latex_engine: xelatex
    fig_caption: TRUE
    df_print: kable
    highlight: tango
    #csl: uncomment to add a custom .csl file for references
fontsize: 12pt
geometry: margin=1in
indent: TRUE
linkcolor: blue
urlcolor: red
citecolor: green
---
